headline: Assessing Welltower (WELL) Valuation As Shares Trade Near Recent Highs
summary: Welltower’s recent performance snapshot Welltower (WELL) has drawn fresh investor attention after a mixed run, with the share price up about 1% over the past 3 months but showing a small decline over the past month. At a recent close of US$183.68, the S&P 500 real estate company has a portfolio focused on seniors and wellness housing, with US$9.91b in revenue and US$960.38m in net income.
